snippet.title: Im on Observation Duty 3 VR Official 10/10 Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1458560/Im_on_Observation_Duty_3/
The NON-VR-VERSION is also included in the purchase.


Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NotoviaOfficial

A thrilling virtual reality psychological horror game. Your job is to look for anomalies in a haunted house. If you see anyhting suspicious (furniture moving, extra objects, intruders), take a photo and send a report. 

Say goodbye to surveillance cameras! The third entry in the cult-classic I'm on Observation Duty -series puts you right inside the haunted house! Can you survive the entire night?
